segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, and it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like nobody cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just polishes that plate oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's getting soaked, and she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is about to collapse, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's raiding the jar like it's his personal stash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl eggs him on, reaching for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just ask instead of sneaking?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden can't salvage this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this irresponsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
